name: Master of the Gilded Arts
entries: At 7th level, you’ve gained an appreciation for not just the art of war but for other artistic pursuits as well. You learn one of the following Artisan Tools: Mason’s, Painter’s, Calligrapher’s, Jeweler’s, or Woodcarver’s.
In addition, you can expend a use of your Inspiring Aura feature to gain proficiency in one skill or tool you do not have proficiency in for 1 minute.
